name: Spirit Eater
description:
If it's laggy try it in something other than chrome (or download the .exe)

'R' to restart when you die (sometimes the text doesn't display)

Press P or Tab to pause and see all the controls

This game is round-based with no ending, comment your highest round!

Check out the difficulty options in the Pause Menu if you are struggling :)

If you find any bugs... I'd like to see you make a bug-free game in 6ish days!

Thank you for playing!

Follow my YouTube if you'd like to see a devlog on this game within the coming weeks, or devlogs on other projects im working on!

Made in around 6 days for Brackey's Game Jam  2023.1

Theme: An End is a New Beginning

Implemented: When the enemies lives end you get new abilities allowing you to grow stronger, plus it has permadeath so...

All assets created by me except that beautiful font: https://www.dafont.com/alagard.font
